augmentsTip: Headliner Priority: True Damage > Edgelord. Can also play vertical Edgelord, but it's less consistent. Positiong Qiyana to snipe enemy tank.

tips.tip: Collect early Yasuo and Superfan units. Yasuo snowballs so position to get kills. Build 3 item Yasuo ASAP.
If you have 6+ copies of Yasuo by 3-1, consider hyper rolling until you hit. Finish no later than after Stage 3 carousel.
Push levels and add in True Damage. Put tank items on Ekko. Finish the board with Qiyana 2 with items.

title: True Damage Yasuo

augmentsTip: Heartsteel staying in your comp is optional late game (Caitlyn shown over Aphelios). Can sell your 4-cost headliner late game for a 5-cost headliner. 60 Cashout = 25% of Thief's Gloves which is OP if you can do it multiple times.

tips.tip: Play strongest board and slam Ezreal's AD items. Preserving HP is valuable later on for Heartsteel stacks.
If you have Heartsteel, you can start playing for it on Stage 3. If you're losing every round, you can consider raising the stakes.
Fast 8 and look for Ezreal, Heartsteel and a 4-cost headliner. Poppy, Zed, Ezreal, Caitlyn, and Thresh are all playable. Prioritize upgraded frontline + Jazz + Big Shot for damage.

title: Heartsteel AD Flex

augmentsTip: Kayle has built in shred so it's less of a priority. Gnar 3 is bait most of the time. Headliner Priority: Pentakill > Edgelord

tips.tip: Play for winstreak and tempo early with Kayle + Superfan. Collect more Kayle and prioritize AS items.
Level and roll for Kayle 2, Pentakill, and Superfan. You can also buy Mordekaiser or Gnar headliner temporarily if needed.
Finish Kayle 3* and push levels for more Pentakill. Give Viego / Karthus leftover items. Cap the board with Yorick and Illaoi.

title: Penta-Kayle

augmentsTip: Position Senna back center so she can maximize AOE spell effectiveness. True Damage emblem goes on Caitlyn. Headliner Priority: True Damage > Rapidfire.

tips.tip: Play for winstreak and tempo early with Senna + Superfan. Collect more Sennas and prioritize AP items.
Level and roll for Senna 2, Ekko, and Superfan. You can also buy Ekko headliner temporarily to stabilize if needed.
Finish Senna 3* and push levels for more True Damage. Give Akali / Caitlyn leftover AD items. Qiyana 2 fully stacked is your win condition.

title: True Damage Senna

augmentsTip: Edgelord positioning flips directly behind the target, meaning you want Riven to angle inwards towards the corners. Can also chase Yone 3 if you are rich / have 8-bit emblem. Headliner Priority: 8-Bit > Edgelord

tips.tip: Focus on econ and any copies of Riven / Yone or Heartsteel. This comp is very expensive so you need the gold.
If you are lose streaking, level to 7 at 3-5 and stabilize around 2* 3-costs. You may need to rent Headliners like Mordekaiser, Yone, or Garen before Riven.
Finish Riven 3* then level to 8 for 4 and 5 costs. Caitlyn 2 takes ranged AD items. Mordekaiser holds tank items.

title: 8-Bit Riven

augmentsTip: Use your Punk roll every turn to get stacking AD. 6 Punk is very strong and worth chasing. Headliner Priority: Punk > Rapidfire.

tips.tip: Punk roll every turn to get strong and hit upgrades. Winstreak and slam items aggressively. Don't spend gold on leveling.
Punk / slow roll for Jinx 3, Vi 3, Pantheon 3, and Twitch 3. Add in Guardians for your frontline. Don't prioritize itemizing Vi unless you hit 6 Punk.
Finish your 3* and push levels. Cap your board with either 6 Punk or Yorick for Guardians.

title: Punk Reroll

augmentsTip: Play only with Pentakill emblem for Akali. Priority: Pentakill > Executioner > Edgelord. Best on high resource encounters so we can itemize all our carries. Yorick 2 caps the board.

tips.tip: Play high tempo around Superfan and a strong Pentakill headliner (Gnar > Kayle). Slam items aggressively.
Level up and maintain high econ / winstreak. Don't roll too much because we need lots of gold for the fast 8.
Fast 8 and look for a 4-cost headliner (Karthus, Akali, Viego). Play 5 or 7 Pentakill and stabilize around Mordekaiser with tank items.

title: Karthus Akali

augmentsTip: Play with strong likelihood for good items on Ahri. Headliner Priority: KDA > Spellweaver > Executioner.

tips.tip: Play high tempo around Superfan and a strong KDA headliner (Kaisa > Evelynn). Slam items aggressively.
Transition to a 2 or 3 cost headliner that can hold items. Seraphine, Senna, Lulu, Ekko are all good.
Fast 8 and look for Ahri or Akali headliner. Aim for 7 KDA or 5 KDA + Spellweavers. Line up Ahri on enemy tank to stun them.

title: E-Girls

augmentsTip: Position Katarina same side as enemy carry. Can also sacrifice Crowd Divers like Evelynn for dive damage on enemy corner. Headliner Priority: Crowd Diver > Country

tips.tip: Either play tempo winstreak with early Katarina with items or lose streak to focus on econ. Focus on Katarina items early.
Level to 6 and roll for Katarina 2, Superfan, and 4 Crowd Diver. Finish 3 items on Katarina ASAP.
Finish Katarina 3 and push levels for more Crowd Divers. Leftover AD Fighter items on Zed. Qiyana 2 with items is your win condition late.

title: Crowd Diver Katarina

augmentsTip: Look to play with That's Jazz Baby or early Bard 2 start with items. Headliner Priority: Jazz > Dazzler > Big Shot. Leftover AD items on MF.

tips.tip: Play early Superfan and Bard. Prioritize mana gain on Bard to farm Doot stacks.
Level to 6 and rolldown for 3 Superfan + Bard 2 + MF. Econ back up and slow roll for Bard 3.
Once you finish 3* Bard, push to level 7. Roll for 3* MF and a 3* tank. Go to 8 for Lucian.

title: That's Jazz Baby!

augmentsTip: Strong with HP scaling augments to build beefy Olaf. Really likes Banshee's Veil as a support item to prevent getting stunned. Headliner Priority: Bruiser > Pentakill.

tips.tip: Collect early Olaf and Bruiser units. Build 3 item Olaf ASAP. Play for winstreak. You can play 2x Olaf 2* for strongest board too.
If you have 6+ copies of Olaf by 3-1, consider hyper rolling until you hit. Finish no later than after Stage 3 carousel.
Push levels and add in Bruisers / Pentakill. You run into issues with melee being too crowded so prioritize more ranged Pentakill units.

title: Bruiser Olaf

augmentsTip: Play when you have early Vex with AP items. Use cheap Punk rolls to be strong and find early upgrades. Headliner Priority: Executioner > Emo

tips.tip: Play strongest board around Punk and Guardians. Use your punk roll every turn for upgrades and scaling AD. Slam for Vex / Guardian items.
Twitch 2 and Pantheon 2 should carry you most of the stage. If you are paired up on level 6, roll a couple times to secure upgrades.
Level to 7 and stabilize around Vex 2, Amumu 2, and Twitch. Econ back up and slow roll for 3* carries.

title: Vexecutioners

augmentsTip: Play when you get early Urgot or Samira drop. 7 Country is good with emblem + Country headliner. If you have Trifecta, drop Sett or Amumu. Headliner Priority: Executioner > Country (unless emblem)

tips.tip: Slam items and play for winstreak. Consider taking econ augments because the comp is very expensive.
Stabilize around 5 Country in the mid game. Finish 3 item Samira or Urgot then start building tank items.
Level to 7 and slow roll for 3* 3-costs. You will likely stay level 7 most of the game until you hit multiple 3* units. Drop Kat for Thresh.

title: Country Road

augmentsTip: Best with Snipers Focus Artifact or Luden's Echo. Position Lux opposite enemy carries. The EDM laser takes the base AP stat of the user, meaning if you stack AP items on Jax, Zed, and Zac, the laser will damage based on their AP (not Lux).

tips.tip: Play a standard high tempo AP opener around any headliner. Slam AP items aggressively. Recommended opener is Disco which transitions to EDM easier.
Level to 6 and add in more frontline to support your Archangel / Deathcap AP carry. If you highroll Lux 2 early, transition items.
Level to 7 and roll for Lux headliner and EDM. When you finish Lux 3, level for more frontline and 5 costs.

title: Laser Show Lux

augmentsTip: Play on high econ / resource openers. Generally clump around Disco balls but some fights may require you to spread out. Headliner Priority: Disco > Dazzler > Sentinel.

tips.tip: Play high tempo around Disco Nami 2 / Taric 2. Slam items aggressively and winstreak.
Add in traits to complement your early carries: Dazzler, Spellweavers, Guardians, etc. Econ up for a Fast 8.
Fast 8 and look for either Twisted Fate or Blitzcrank headliner. Stabilize and push to level 9 for Sona / Ziggs. If you're stuck on level 8, you will bleed out.

title: Discoteca

augmentsTip: Headliner Priority: EDM > Mosher. Position Jax same side as enemy carry. Some fights you may want to EDM Lux instead.

tips.tip: Focus on econ and any copies of Jax. You are looking to spike on Stage 3 / level 6. Build Jax items.
Level to 6 and roll for Jax 2, Lux, and 4 Moshers. Econ back up for level 7.
Roll on 7 for Jax 3, Lux 3, Zed, and Zac. Splash in Jazz on level 8. Extra items go on Zed 2.

title: EDM Jax

augmentsTip: Headliner Priority: Spellweaver > Emo. Can also play vertical Emo if you get emblem. KDA positioning will change every game so adjust accordingly.

tips.tip: Collect early Annies and Superfan units. Sell to make econ if necessary. Build 3 item Annie ASAP.
Slow roll for Annie 3 and Superfans. Finish no later than after Stage 3 carousel.
Push levels and add in Spellweavers. Put tank items on Neeko or Ekko. Finish the board with Sona.

title: Annie Weavers

augmentsTip: Usually played when committing to a 3-cost Edgelord reroll and you want to stay open to either Riven or Yone primary carry. Keep your items open for maximum flexibility. Heartsteel is optional.

tips.tip: Focus on econ and any copies of Riven / Yone or Heartsteel. This comp is expensive so you need the gold.
If you are lose streaking, level to 7 at 3-5 and stabilize around 2* 3-costs. You may need to rent Headliners like Mordekaiser or Riven before Yone.
Finish Yone3* then level to 8 for 4 and 5 costs. Zed 2 takes ranged AD items. Mordekaiser holds tank items.

title: Crowd Diver Yone

augmentsTip: Play only with Rap Queen Hero Augment for Akali. Priority: K/DA or True Damage > Executioner.

tips.tip: Play a standard winstreak opener. You pivot into this comp when you're already playing for K/DA or True Damage and hit the Hero Augment.
Fast 8 and look for a 4-cost headliner (Akali > Ahri). Work with whatever Breakout trait for Akali you're more likely to upgrade.
Look for Qiyana 2 to help anti-tank late game. Add in Karthus or more True Damage if you are lacking damage.

title: Rap Queen Akali

augmentsTip: Play with strong likelihood for good items on Ahri and you have strong combat augments for Sentinels. Headliner Priority: Sentinel > Spellweaver > KD/A.

tips.tip: Play high tempo around Sentinel and Spellweavers + strong KDA headliner (Seraphine). Slam items aggressively.
Transition to a 2 or 3 cost headliner that can hold items. Seraphine, Garen, Lulu, Ekko are all good. Can also play for Heartsteel in the mid game.
Fast 8 and look for Ahri or Blitz headliner. Aim for 6 Sentinels + Spellweavers. Line up Ahri on enemy tank to stun them. Sona on 9.

title: Ahri Sentinels

augmentsTip: Play when you have powerful Artifact for Garen and can get 3 items quickly. Play the Ahri sentinel core. Leftover tank on Blitzcrank. Headliner Priority: Sentinel > 8 Bit.

tips.tip: Play high tempo around Sentinel Corki. Slam items aggressively. Look for 3 item Garen ASAP.
Sell your headliner and roll on level 6 for 4 Sentinel and Garen 2. Slow roll above 50g for Garen 3. Other 3* are not worth chasing unless very rich.
Once you finish Garen 3, level for 6 Sentinels + Spellweavers. Line up Ahri on enemy tank to stun them.

title: Big Garen

augmentsTip: Play with Submit to the Pit and aim for 8 Moshers. You can also reroll any of the Mosher units. Sett 3 / Urgot 3 are the most common, but you can also go Jax, Gnar, or even Vi carry.
metaTitle: Submit to the Pit Poppy Mosher

tips.tip: Play around tempo Moshers. Slam any fighter items aggressively. AD melee will go on Vi -> Poppy. AP on Jax. Ranged AD on Urgot.
Level for 6 Moshers on 6 + whatever additional trait that fits your carry. Econ up for a Fast 8. Take another combat augment if you can.
Fast 8 and look for Poppy and 8 Moshers. If you stay on 8, look for 3* 3 cost Moshers. Otherwise, push levels to look for Yorick 2.

title: Mosh Pit

augmentsTip: Headliner Priority: Emo > Spellweaver. Board caps the highest with 5 costs and Emo Emblem (Sona > Yorick). KDA positioning will change every game so adjust accordingly.

tips.tip: Collect early Annies and Superfan units. Sell to make econ if necessary. Build 3 item Annie ASAP.
Slow roll for Annie 3 and Superfans. Finish no later than after Stage 3 carousel. Add in 4 Emo.
Push levels and add in 6 Emo with duo carry Ahri or Karthus. Late game take out Superfan and play Guardians + Spellweavers.

title: Emo Annie

augmentsTip: Corki has anti-heal built into his ability so it is lower priority than usual. If you hit 8-Bit emblem, play for Riven and drop the Jazz / Lucian package. Headliner Priority: 8-bit > Big Shot

tips.tip: Collect early Corkis. Sell to make econ if necessary. Build 3 item Corki ASAP.
Slow roll for Corki 3 and 8-Bit + Sentinel + Big Shot. Once you finish, push levels. Garen 3 is nice to have but not necessary.
Look for Caitlyn and a strong Rapidfire duo carry. You can play Heartsteel in the mid game with Yone / Aphelios / Ezreal for resources. Cap with 5 costs.

title: 8-Bit Corki

augmentsTip: Strongest cap is around Lucian, but you can also play 3* Senna and Guardian reroll as a variation. Yorick 2 with items helps cap the board. Keep center open so Caitlyn and Lucian snipe far enemies.

tips.tip: Play a strong Rapidfure Punk opener and slam items aggressively. Use your Punk roll every turn to get upgrades early.
Aim for 4 Guardian frontline and an upgraded backline. Flex in Superfan if needed. Senna 2 headliner can hold items for Caitlyn / Lucian.
Fast 8 and look for Caitlyn or Thresh as a headliner. Once stable, push 9 for Yorick / Lucian.

title: Guardian Rapidfire
